name: Uplifting (georgieF)
description:
An uplifting interactive story about a monkey bellhop and the residents of his building. With a crush on the beautiful sausage dog, will our bellhop help or hinder her duck boyfriend?

An interactive story made with fungus in unity.

This game was inspired by a singular picture and I designed the whole game from the inspiration of that image: https://www.newgrounds.com/art/view/lundsfryd/bellhop . I very much took this image loosely and designed something that was more of my style, it was my springboard to create a random animal love story with Bobbie the bellhop at the centre of it! The original concept was just for the interactions between residents and the bellhop, but I later included a romance story to make the game have more flow and structure.

 Whilst this game was one of my first looks into branching narratives, I would like to expand the game to have even more ending possibilities with more characters and different consequences. As I learn this new programme further, I would like to add variables to change the consequences of the game and expand Uplifting's current 3 major branch structures!
